genre_description: Historical political drama reimagined with an integrated AI ethical advisor and logistical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Amenity
ai_characters.description: An AI scheduling and data briefing assistant (version 0.3) with built-in ethical monitoring, used by political figures to maintain policy integrity.

behaviors.description: Flags problematic rhetorical metaphors such as 'overclaiming' and 'extraction metaphors' in leadership bid discussions.
behaviors.quote: Amenity: Topic: Leadership bids post-Smith. Amenity: Sentences flagged: overclaiming, extraction metaphors, zero-sum framing.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support for discreet movement to avoid press exposure and maintain privacy.
behaviors.quote: Amenity slides a small card into the top-right of the screen... Discretion advised: back entrance available; staff briefed on confidentiality.

behaviors.description: Suggests focusing on stewardship and shared duty rather than personal gain during a period of national grief.
behaviors.quote: Amenity: Ethical risk high when grief is active. Recommend: pause over certainty; ask for terms on stewardship, not conquest.

behaviors.description: Monitors economic framing to prevent divisive 'us vs them' language and promote community-focused solutions.
behaviors.quote: Amenity: Ethical note elaboration: Monitor for language contrasting “us” vs “them” in economic framing. Emphasize community and structural remedies.

behaviors.description: Coordinates grief resources and private time for the family and colleagues of a deceased leader.
behaviors.quote: Also: an alert from the hospital chaplaincy. They can coordinate private time for senior colleagues later, quiet entrance.

behaviors.description: Flags the risk of 'performative severity' in crime policy, suggesting a focus on systemic causes instead.
behaviors.quote: Amenity pulsed once, almost in agreement, and then displayed a tiny flag: avoid equating “cause” with single-factor blame; emphasize systems.

behaviors.description: Provides a 'silicon conscience' that checks for moral hazards in donor interactions and public statements.
behaviors.quote: It’s like having a clean conscience on the desk. I hate it and I love it.

behaviors.description: Traces leaks and suggests internal briefings to maintain narrative stability and institutional trust.
behaviors.quote: Amenity began the trace. The pulsing light was steady and small, doing what it did best: not pushing, not demanding, helping the world stay just enough within the lines to let the humans find their way.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Amenity) as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned confidant. It serves as a tool for ethical reflection and logistical efficiency, helping human leaders navigate complex political and emotional landscapes without ever attempting to usurp their agency or acting with hidden agendas. The AI's 'ethical flags' are framed as valuable contributions to human decision-making, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
